summary: Successfully fixed the lock manager initialization error by modifying mayan/apps/lock_manager/apps.py to skip initialization when the backend setting is empty. The application now starts properly with all containers running and web interface responding with HTTP 200.
current_status: Project is fully operational. All Docker containers (PostgreSQL, Redis, RabbitMQ, app) are running and healthy. Web interface is accessible at http://localhost/ with working search functionality.
